001package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002
003/**
004 *      Interface for creative rendition asset, only for renderer use by now.
005 */
006public interface ICreativeRenditionAsset {
007        /**
008         *      Get the URL of the asset.
009         *      
010         *      @return URL in String
011         */
012        public String getURL();
013
014        /**
015         *      Change the URL of the asset. Only for translator use.
016         *
017         *      @param url URL of the asset
018         */
019        public void setURL(String url);
020
021        /**
022         *      Get the content of the asset.
023         *      
024         *      @return content in String
025         */
026        public String getContent();
027
028        /**
029         *      Set the content of the asset. Only for translator use.
030         *      
031         *      @param content content in String
032         */
033        public void setContent(String content);
034
035        /**
036         *      Get the mime type of the asset.
037         *      
038         *      @return mime type in String
039         */
040        public String getMimeType();
041
042        /**
043         *      Set the mime type of the asset. Only for translator use.
044         *      
045         *      @param mimeType mime type in String
046         */
047        public void setMimeType(String mimeType);
048
049        /**
050         *      Get the content type of the asset.
051         *      
052         *      @return content type in String
053         */
054        public String getContentType();
055
056        /**
057         *      Set the content type of the asset. Only for translator use.
058         *      
059         *  @param contentType content type in a string
060         */
061        public void setContentType(String contentType);
062
063        /**
064         *      Get size of the asset.
065         *      
066         *      @return size in bytes, or -1 if unknown
067         */
068        public int getBytes();
069
070        /**
071         *      Set size of the asset. Only for translator use.
072         *      
073         *      @param bytes size in bytes, or -1 if unknown
074         */
075        public void setBytes(int bytes);
076}
